title: You can do it!
brief_description: Based on the book by Michael E. Bernard. This video is designed to aid students (and others) in developing the skills and essential attitudes necessary for success in school and happiness in life. The video addresses issues such as goal setting, time management, attitudes, self-confidence, self-motivation, exam anxiety and relationships.
